mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, LAST_LOGIN_DATE, COUNT, CONSECUTIVE_DAYS, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), LAST_LOGIN_DATE) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TODAY_LOGIN FROM MEMBER_ATTENDANCE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ATTENDANCE ( MEMBER_ID, LAST_LOGIN_DATE, COUNT, CONSECUTIVE_DAYS, UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 1, 1, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_ATTENDANCE SET CONSECUTIVE_DAYS = CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), LAST_LOGIN_DATE) = 1 THEN CONSECUTIVE_DAYS + 1 ELSE 1 END, LAST_LOGIN_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), COUNT = COUNT + 1, UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT_ID, MEMBER_ID, BADGE_TYPE, COUNT FROM BADGE_COUNT WHERE 1=1 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND BADGE_TYPE = #{badgeType}
